Description: HIV disease resulting in infectious and parasitic diseases
HIV disease resulting in mycobacterial infection
Coding Rule: Code first B20.0, followed by A15-A19 to indicate type of TB

Description: Respiratory tuberculosis, bacteriologically and histologically confirmed
Coding Rule: If TB is HIV-related, sequence B20.0 first
Use J13-J17 if organism is known
Use when patient has HIV but no symptoms and TB is not HIV-related
